item.description: Teammate Conflict examples: 1) Situation: Task Action result Stakeholder Conflict: Difficult Client (Dean) Situation: Client confronted me alone, upset about work I was doing on his project without his knowledge.
Q1 Identified Errors in data Tell us about a time when you identified an error through QA/QC of geological data.

Managing multiple tasks (dependent) Completing a new mineral resource estimate Break down the project into logical groups (data collection, data prep/cleanup, Data exploration, QAQC, modeling project extents, prepping data for MRE, Completing the MRE, Model checks/QAQC, report writeup) Determine how each step is connected to others.
